coreAtributes.authorTag: A small tag sewn into the shirt's side seam reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's short-sleeved shirt
coreAtributes.description: A short sleeve dress shirt with reinforced stitching. The rank slides on the epaulets and the nameplate make it clear as to what occupation the wearer is supposed to have.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] [npc.her] arms through the shirt's sleeves and [npc.verb(button)] up the front.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the shirt's sleeves and [npc.verb(button)] up the front.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] arms through the shirt's sleeves and hastily [npc.verb(button)] up the front.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the front of [npc.her] shirt and [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] arms out of the sleeves.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the front of [npc2.namePos] shirt and [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.her] [npc2.verb(pull)] [npc2.her] arms out of the sleeves.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] open the buttons on the front of [npc2.namePos] shirt and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.her] arms out of the sleeves.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(button)] up the front of [npc2.namePos] shirt.
